EXTRACTED VALUE: The most explosive action game on Xbox 360 yet. "GTA"s suddenly got a lot to live up to. [Mar 2007, p.64]
A work of Tolkeinesque proportions and not only the greatest RPG of our times, but one of the greatest games of all time. Wholeheartedly recommended.
I can't gush enough about how excited I am that the Soulcalibur name has reclaimed its greatness in the annals of fighting titles.
This is the Madden that hardcore footballers have been waiting for. The rest of us should be sure to tone down the difficulty.
Single-handedly worth the price of an Xbox 360. Buy it. We implore you. [Nov 2007, p.74]
The crystals return to the series, along with a four-member party, blue magic, and black mages. [Feb 2003, p.97]
I haven’t had a gaming session like this in a long time. It’s one you kick the roommates off of the TV for or call in sick to work for.
Go ahead and spend the points on this, regardless of if you have an older version, or even if you somehow haven't heard of Rez. [Spring 2008, p.60]
The rarest of things: a video game with looks, brains, and heart.
Basically the developers took everything that was right about GT and multiplied it by a factor of ten in GT2.
Is it a fresh and unusual take on shooters, on horror survival, or both? Ah, let's just say it's fresh and unusual and leave it at that.
While PD0 may not be a revolutionary game, it can be considered a huge evolutionary step in the right direction.
08 is the best hockey game in years. [Oct 2007, p.87]
The most accurate description of American Football on a videogame console that I’ve ever seen.
The area that has probably received the most attention has been the AI of your team mates.
Fight Night round 3 doesn’t radically change the series but the gameplay is so incredibly solid that the game is still heavily recommended.
